review.reviewBody: Flying Beaver has great prices and great food. The Bad Boy Burger  is huge, has well-seasoned meat and lots of toppings. The Pulled Pork Sandwich  had lots of pork and was super tasty. The pulled pork macaroni and cheese is also really good.

The clam chowder was the best anywhere, thick and delicious. The Happy Sunshine Bowl was really good, not too spicy and filling. The Cajun Prawn Linguini was good too. Portions are well worth the money.
Amazing food! Everything was fresh, tasty and great presentation. Thank you for a lovely dinner!
Super delicious! The pasta was out of this world good!
Love The Happy Sunshine Bowl, it's delicious and a good size (sometimes I can't  even finish it.) Everything I've tried here is good, but this bowl is my favourite
